name: Advantage Media Nordics
tag_list: advertising, media, social, re-target, personalized-re-targeting, search-re-targeting, cpm, cpc, mobile-advertising, pay-per-click, paid-search, seo, bid-management, display-advertising, behavioural-targeting
overview:
With an online marketing strategy at Advantage Media it is possible to achieve following marketing objectives

  • Generation of qualified traffic to the site
  • Optimization of conversion flow
  • Optimization of traffic from from Facebook and Google
  • Cross sales from different channels
  • Increased ROI

With an in-depth understanding of both the media industry and technologies we will help you in the setup and day to day running and optimization of your campaigns regardless of the geographic market(s) of your interest. In order for the optimization to bring the best results, we make it possible to track campaign performance in terms of KPIs, Basket Siza, and Order ID.

Advantage Media helps you in working carefully with the target group, and this way combine the ideal collection of products creating the foundament of an effective digital strategy. The aim of this strategy is to generate concrete actiondriven goals for how to react in all of the digital touch points. This will take a departure in the question of how the company achieves the most relevant business advantages.
